name: Dodge (itch) (chrishayb)
description: Grab a mate who's been talking smack about your video game skills and jump into dodge, the ideal game to go head on against a friend. Dodge is a fast paced, two player, 2D action platformer game where good spatial awareness is the key to victory. Inspired by the classic video game pong, Dodge adds power ups, x and y axis movement and lots and lots of balls in the mix.
